Method Detail

getConfiguration

public model.config.Configuration getConfiguration()
                                            throws model.config.ParserException
Extract data from the file the class is storing, and converts it into a Configuration instance for the game to use. NOTE: This scanner uses a method we learned from the weekly assignment no. 5 (phonemore), more specifically, the parser class. Nothing is actually copied from the class, but that is the reason for any resemblance.

Specified by:
getConfiguration in interface model.config.IParser
Returns:
A Configuration object with all the data.
Throws:
ParserException - An exception message generated by the parser. Only the message is filled by the parser, but it's pretty precise.
